bibl.title: Imaging the Carbonized Papyri from Herculaneum.
Special Issue on the Use of Computers in the Study of Ancient Documents
bibl.author: OBBINK, Dirk

bibl.note: Describes a project to capture digitized images of the papyri from Herculaneum. For comparison and control, a collateral project has been undertaken involving the imaging of the Greek papyri from Oxyrhynchus.
OBBINK Dirk, Imaging the Carbonized Papyri from Herculaneum.
A.K. BOWMAN and Marilyn DEEGAN (Edd.), Special Issue on the Use of Computers in the Study of Ancient Documents = Literary & Linguistic Computing 12 (1997) No. 3, pp. 159-161.
